function: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
static_description: The main page displays a navigation bar with links to Home, Survey, Dashboard, and Login pages. All content areas load dynamically via API calls to the backend.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on navigation links fetches corresponding views through API endpoints without full page reload.

resource_dependency.database_schema_definition: CREATE TABLE surveys(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INTEGER NOT NULL, submission_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, age_group VARCHAR(50), pregnancy_status BOOLEAN, menstrual_cycle_regular BOOLEAN, contraceptive_use TEXT[], chronic_conditions TEXT[], medications TEXT[], exercise_frequency VARCHAR(50), dietary_habits TEXT, mental_health_status VARCHAR(50));

function: A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
static_description: Backend server initializes connection to PostgreSQL using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp. It exposes RESTful endpoints for managing health survey data.

resource_dependency.validation_error_message: Please complete all required fields before submitting.
resource_dependency.success_submission_message: Thank you! Your survey has been successfully submitted.

function: A health survey form interface for users to input and submit health information
static_description: Health survey form displayed on a whitesmoke background with dark cyan styled components. Includes various input fields such as checkboxes, radio buttons, dropdowns, and text areas labeled according to form_field_labels.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the Submit button validates inputs and sends POST request to /surveys/submit endpoint.
As users enter data into form fields, real-time validation feedback updates field states.

resource_dependency.survey_data_table_structure: Table name: surveys | Columns: id (PK), user_id (FK), submission_date, age_group, pregnancy_status, menstrual_cycle_regular, contraceptive_use (TEXT[]), chronic_conditions (TEXT[]), medications (TEXT[]), exercise_frequency, dietary_habits, mental_health_status

function: Data management functionality to store and organize submitted survey responses
static_description: Submitted surveys are stored in a PostgreSQL table named 'surveys' with structured columns matching the form fields.

resource_dependency.access_control_rules: Survey takers can only fill forms. Reviewers can view submitted data. Admins can manage users and export data.

function: User permission management system to control access to data and features
static_description: Permissions are managed internally within the backend logic using role-based access controls mapped to user accounts.

function: Data review interface for authorized personnel to view and validate submissions
static_description: Authorized users see a list of submitted surveys with options to drill down into individual entries for detailed viewing and approval actions.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a submission entry opens its detailed view where reviewers can approve or flag it.

reporting_visualizations: Line Graph: Exercise Trends Over Time
resource_dependency.aggregation_queries: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM surveys GROUP BY age_group;

function: Reporting dashboard to display aggregated health data insights
static_description: Dashboard presents visual charts summarizing collected health data trends among female respondents across multiple categories.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over chart segments reveals tooltip details about the represented segment.

function: Responsive web design with whitesmoke background and dark cyan styled components
static_description: Website uses CSS variables to define --background-color as whitesmoke (#F5F5F5) and --component-color as dark cyan (#008B8B). Layout adapts responsively for mobile devices.

resource_dependency.session_management_strategy: JWT tokens issued upon successful login

function: Authentication system to manage user sessions and roles
static_description: Users authenticate through a login form which issues JWT tokens for session persistence throughout the app.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' submits credentials to auth endpoint and stores token in browser storage.

function: Survey form validation to ensure complete and accurate data submission
static_description: Form includes built-in client-side validation indicators showing error messages when required fields are left blank or contain invalid data formats.

interaction_and_states.description: Attempting to submit incomplete form highlights empty required fields and shows associated error messages.

function: Data export functionality for administrators to download survey results
static_description: Admin panel contains an Export button allowing downloads of compiled survey data in CSV or PDF format.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the Export button triggers GET request to admin endpoint returning downloadable file stream.

resource_dependency.audit_log_table_structure: Table name: audit_logs | Columns: log_id (PK), timestamp, user_id (FK), action_type, affected_resource_id, old_values, new_values

function: Audit logging for tracking data access and modifications
static_description: System maintains logs of critical operations performed by users on sensitive health data in a dedicated audit_logs table.

role_definitions.survey_taker: Can fill out and submit surveys
role_definitions.reviewer: Can read and validate submitted surveys
role_definitions.admin: Full access including user management and exports

resource_dependency.rbac_middleware: Middleware enforcing route protection based on user roles

function: Role-based access control for different user types (e.g., survey takers, reviewers, admins)
static_description: Each protected route checks user's assigned role against predefined permissions ensuring appropriate access levels.

resource_dependency.package_json_scripts: { "install:all": "concurrently \"cd frontend && npm install\" \"cd backend && npm install\"", "dev": "concurrently \"cd frontend && npm run dev\" \"cd backend && npm run dev\"" }

function: Concurrent development setup with npm scripts for installing dependencies and running both frontend and backend
static_description: Root package.json includes custom scripts 'install:all' and 'dev' that use concurrently to execute commands in both frontend and backend directories simultaneously.

resource_dependency.schema_sql_files: tables.sql containing CREATE statements for users, surveys, audit_logs, and permissions tables

function: Database schema design to support health survey data storage and retrieval
static_description: Initial database schema includes tables for storing user profiles, survey submissions, audit trails, and permission mappings necessary for supporting the full feature set.
